graph_title: Prevalence of moderate or severe food insecurity in the population, based on the Food Insecurity Experience Scale (FIES)
indicator_name: Prevalence of moderate or severe food insecurity in the population, based on the Food Insecurity Experience Scale (FIES)
SDG_GOAL: Goal 2: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
SDG_TARGET: Target 2.1: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 2.1.2: Prevalence of moderate or severe food insecurity in the population, based on the Food Insecurity Experience Scale (FIES)
STAT_CONC_DEF: The indicator measures the percentage of individuals in the population who have experienced food insecurity at moderate or severe levels during the reference period. The severity of food insecurity, defined as a latent trait, is measured on the Food Insecurity Experience Scale global reference scale, a measurement standard established by FAO through the application of the Food Insecurity Experience Scale in more than 140 countries worldwide, starting in 2014.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 2: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 2.1: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 2.1.2: Prevalence of moderate or severe food insecurity in the population, based on the Food Insecurity Experience Scale (FIES)

fr.SDG_GOAL: Objectif 2 : Éliminer la faim, assurer la sécurité alimentaire, améliorer la nutrition et promouvoir l’agriculture durable
fr.SDG_TARGET: Cible 2.1 : D’ici 2030, éliminer la faim et faire en sorte que chacun, en particulier les pauvres et les personnes en situation vulnérable, y compris les nourrissons, ait accès toute l’année à une alimentation saine, nutritive et suffisante
fr.SDG_INDICATOR: Indicateur 2.1.2: Prévalence d’une insécurité alimentaire modérée ou grave, évaluée selon l’échelle de mesure de l’insécurité alimentaire vécue (échelle FIES)
fr.SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Objectif 2 : Éliminer la faim, assurer la sécurité alimentaire, améliorer la nutrition et promouvoir l’agriculture durable
fr.SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Cible 2.1 : D’ici 2030, éliminer la faim et faire en sorte que chacun, en particulier les pauvres et les personnes en situation vulnérable, y compris les nourrissons, ait accès toute l’année à une alimentation saine, nutritive et suffisante
fr.SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicateur 2.1.2: Prévalence d’une insécurité alimentaire modérée ou grave, évaluée selon l’échelle de mesure de l’insécurité alimentaire vécue (échelle FIES)
